mapper.insert: INSERT INTO `ranking` ( `characterId` , `rank` , `startStandard` , `endStandard` , `createdAt` , `updatedAt` ) SELECT `id` , ROW_NUMBER() OVER (ORDER BY `originStat` DESC , `level` DESC) AS `rank` , CURDATE() AS `startStandard` , DATE_ADD(CURDATE() , INTERVAL 6 DAY) AS `endStandard` , NOW() , NOW() FROM `myCharacter` ORDER BY `originStat` DESC, `level` DESC LIMIT 100;
